1.1.1.hardeningScript: cmd /c "echo [System Access] > %TEMP%\secpol.inf && echo PasswordHistorySize = 24 >> %TEMP%\secpol.inf && secedit /configure /db %windir%\security\database\secedit.sdb /cfg %TEMP%\secpol.inf /quiet && del %TEMP%\secpol.inf"
1.1.1.revertHardeningScript: cmd /c "echo [System Access] > %TEMP%\secpol.inf && echo PasswordHistorySize = 0 >> %TEMP%\secpol.inf && secedit /configure /db %windir%\security\database\secedit.sdb /cfg %TEMP%\secpol.inf /quiet && del %TEMP%\secpol.inf"
